column4: nyone know why moving a 10.04 install to a new computer causes virtualbox VMs (and minecraft too) to fail to start?
moved physical HDD containing install and its swap partition
what happens when you try to start them ?
minecraft blackscreens, virtualbox vms is stuck at 0% starting
no they are not, LTS releases can upgrade to non-LTS releases just fine
different everything. old cpu: AMD athlon 64 new cpu: Intel core i5-750 old gfx: nvidia geforce gt240, new: geforce gtx280
, so that's something I'd look at resolving
for the lts release software sources isnt set to show upgrade to non-lts releass, at least in 10.04
yes, so you can get set it to what you want
that does'nt mean it's not designed to be upgraded to non-lts releases.
so your hardware has changed, there will be modules that will need to be loaded and old ones stopped, especially around the video card
reinstall graphics drivers? its the same family of gfx cards tho
also look at the virtualisation modules,
what I dont get is ive reinstalled virtualsbox a few times now
